title: The New Answers DVD 1
description: What do you really believe—and why does it matter to your life, your family, and your faith?

We live in a culture with more questions than ever—questions that affect one’s acceptance of the Bible as authoritative and trustworthy. This DVD features easyto- understand answers to some of the most-important apologetics quandaries of today. You’ll love these highly stylized mini-interviews, featuring authors from the best-selling books. This DVD contains twelve answers, each about 4-minutes in length.
This DVD answers the following questions:
Is There Really a God? (Ham)
Is There Really a God? (Ham)
Cain’s Wife—Who Was She? (Ham)
Cain’s Wife—Who Was She? (Ham)
Does Distant Starlight Prove the Universe Is Old? (Lisle)
Does Distant Starlight Prove the Universe Is Old? (Lisle)
Is Natural Selection the Same Thing as Evolution? (Purdom)
Is Natural Selection the Same Thing as Evolution? (Purdom)
Doesn’t Carbon-14 Dating Disprove the Bible? (Snelling)
Doesn’t Carbon-14 Dating Disprove the Bible? (Snelling)
Why Shouldn’t Christians Accept Millions of Years? (Mortenson)
Why Shouldn’t Christians Accept Millions of Years? (Mortenson)
Did Dinosaurs Turn into Birds? (Menton)
Did Dinosaurs Turn into Birds? (Menton)
Genesis: Today’s Answer to Racism (Kerby)
Genesis: Today’s Answer to Racism (Kerby)
Was There Really a Noah’s Ark & Flood? (Ham)
Was There Really a Noah’s Ark & Flood? (Ham)
What Really Happened to the Dinosaurs? (Ham)
What Really Happened to the Dinosaurs? (Ham)
How Did Defense Attack Structures Come About? (Hodge)
How Did Defense Attack Structures Come About? (Hodge)
How to Survive a Secular College (Lisle)
How to Survive a Secular College (Lisle)
Concise and fast-paced, this cutting-edge DVD is especially great for teens and young adults. (Ten of the answers are based on topics in The New Answers Book 1, and two are totally new.)
